title: Fuzzy antiqua font
content:
\<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\>it looks like this font has been copied and re-scanned several times - it is called artois, but i could not find it anywhere on the web. does anybody know, which foundry has it or, if its free-/shareware, where i can download it?   
   
 ![antiqua font](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110024505im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38086.gif)\</font\>
author: pigsound

comments.content: It looks sort of like someone used the blend tool on Futura and Times. That doesn't account for the a, the g, or the square dots.
